scripts.start-ssc: mkdir -p ./dist && rm -rf ./dist/* && postcss src/style.css --use postcss-nesting > dist/style.css && cp ./src/index.html dist && esbuild --bundle src/index.js > dist/index.js && ssc build -r
scripts.build: npm run build-ssc && npm run build-web
scripts.build-ssc: mkdir -p dist && rm -rf ./dist/* && postcss src/style.css --use postcss-nesting > dist/style.css && cp ./src/index.html dist && esbuild --bundle src/index.js > dist/index.js && ssc build
scripts.build-web: mkdir -p public && rm -rf ./public/* && npm run copy && vite build
